tool_description: An API showing all latest Canadian Federal Government News, from a variety of different Canadian News Sources.
name: Live Canadian Politics
title: Live Canadian Politics

api_list.name: Retrieve Canadian political news, from a specific news source.
api_list.description: This endpoint gets latest political news articles from a specific source. Sources available are: The Globe and Mail, CBC, National Post, Vice, Maclean's Magazine, National Observer, iPolitics, and Canada.com.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-canadian-politics.p.rapidapi.com/news/CBC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-canadian-politics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-canadian-politics.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-canadian-politics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve all Federal Canadian Politics news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news relating to Canadian federal politics, from a variety of Canadian sources.
api_list.code:

url = "https://live-canadian-politics.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
